title: why i am here?HELP
body:
hi i need help im a user that usually plays in EU WEST but someone hack mi count an use my rp to came here i need help and i would like to go back to eu west without using rp i dont care about the rp that they use but i jus want to go back to mi server 
Pls help me 
mi count  pilier51
i have already send a advise to the lol help user but they dont answer me
note i havent click any strange link.and i have already change mi password

replies.body: They usually take around a day to reply to support tickets. It hasn't even been half a day yet. Just be a bit more patient.
